title: Night Ranger - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Assassins   Bloodlines   Cautious Protagonist   Demons   Dragons   Elves   Fast Learner   Game Elements   Gods   Gore   Hard-Working Protagonist   Leadership   Level System   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Medieval   Mind Control   Monsters   Nobles   Pets   Ruthless Protagonist   Secret Identity   Skill Assimilation   Strategic Battles   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Thieves   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World   Weak to Strong
author: Dark Blue Coconut Milk   Deepblue Coconut Juice   深蓝椰子汁
description:
After transmigrating into a weak noble body, Marvin discovered that he was familiar with the world, this was the game he played in his previous life and… Damn! He only had six months before the Great Calamity! 

As a former top player, he would obviously fight to save the world… Yeah, no. Time to plan and prepare for the upcoming events, better to use that knowledge to get ahead rather than fight with gods. 

Follow Marvin’s journey through this new world.>
